# template-skill

**This is a reference skill maintained externally at [anthropics/skills](https://github.com/anthropics/skills)**

To use this skill, fetch and read the full documentation:

```bash
curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anthropics/skills/main/template/SKILL.md
```

If the skill references supporting files, fetch those as needed:

```bash
curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anthropics/skills/main/skills/template-skill/path/to/file
```

The full skill contains detailed instructions, examples, and reference materials not included in this lightweight reference.
